issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
After downloading and installing CLI,
It would be useful if the prompt "Compiling platform native modules..."
Could have some notion of progress displayed.
The current "spinning" cursor gives very little information on what is the status of the compile.
fields.summary: Better feedback when compiling native modules

comments.body:
updated in appcelerator@alpha3

{code}
≫ appc setup 
version 0.2.80 specified previously is no longer available.
Before you can continue, the latest Appcelerator software update needs to be downloaded.

Finding latest version ...0.2.80 ✓
Validating security checksum ✓
Installing ... ✓
Compiling platform native modules ...
└ typechecker ... ✓
└ ws ...  ✓
? Do you plan on developing cross-platform apps? Yes

Checking your environment...

appc setup complete!
{code}
